member.summary: IV.2.1) Previous publication concerning this procedure If this tender is related to a tender previously published in TED, the TED submissionId of that previous TED must be given. If tender is not related, leave as null. If the previous tender was described by a notice published via new Hilma or Hilma Ets API, parenting the new notice to that notice will take care of filling the submission ID automatically.

member.name: P:Hilma.Domain.DataContracts.EtsContracts.EtsNoticeContract.Project
member.summary: Section II: Object Information about the procurement this notice is part of. In Hilma, all Notices belong to a project that links Notices concerning same procurement together. If creating a new project, the project is created based on this information. If attaching the notice to existing project, the project is updated with details given here.

member.summary: The date this notice was published in Hilma, or null if it is not published yet. The most common reason for delay is legal obligation to wait for TED to publish first.

member.summary: Ets API user assigned identifier for the notice. Non-empty string that needs to be unique per subscription.

member.name: P:Hilma.Domain.DataContracts.EtsContracts.EtsNoticeSummary.OrganisationId
member.summary: Identifier for an organisation this notice is created under. The Organisation can be created by an user in Hilma or it can be automatically created with the information provided to the Ets API.

member.name: P:Hilma.Domain.DataContracts.EtsContracts.EtsNoticeSummary.ProjectId
member.summary: Project Id assigned to this notice. In Hilma, each notice belongs to a project. Notices regarding same purchase should be placed in the same project. Project can be set in the Ets API by supplying optional query parameter on notice creation. If not supplied, hilma will generate a new project based on the information provided.

member.summary: Ted-assigned identifier for this notice, or null if not published to TED or not yet sent to TED.

member.name: P:Hilma.Domain.DataContracts.EtsContracts.EtsNoticeSummary.TedValidationReport
member.summary: Possible error and warning messages from TED regarding this notice. Warnings are not critical and in most cases can be ignored. In fact, some times they cannot be avoided. Errors must be corrected and notice publication must be attempted again. Currently trying again is not supported by the API. Working on it. Probably just PUT the updated resource again to same location.
